description:
go.tools/ssa: emit ChangeType when using method as function in f := T.meth.

Previously: typeOf(f).Signature.Recv == T
       Now: typeOf(f).Signature.Params.At(0) == T

Added test.

BUG=5781

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=43cab0702d88&repo=tools ***

go.tools/ssa: emit ChangeType when using method as function in f := T.meth.

Previously: typeOf(f).Signature.Recv == T
       Now: typeOf(f).Signature.Params.At(0) == T

Added test.

BUG=5781

R=gri
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10622043
